mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advice_sst(ss_idx, ss_time, sf_idx, ss_day, ss_name, ss_pp, tr_idx, ss_msg, ss_msubject, ss_bd, ss_member, ss_mday, ss_pa) values(#{ss_idx}, #{ss_time}, #{sf_idx},#{ ss_day}, #{ss_name}, #{ss_pp}, #{tr_idx}, #{ss_msg}, #{ss_msubject}, #{ss_bd}, #{ss_member}, #{ss_mday}, #{ss_pa})
